question: Nobel laureate Toni Morrison has passed away. She was from which country?
explanation: Nobel Prize-winning US author Toni Morrison (88) has passed away in New York, United States on 5th August 2019. She is  the first African-American woman to win a Nobel Prize in Literature for her novels depicting the struggles of black Americans living in a white society ridden with racial discrimination. She won the 1988 Pulitzer Prize for fiction for â€œBeloved\" that told the story of a runaway female slave and was made into a film starring Oprah Winfrey in 1998. In 2012, President Barack Obama presented her with the highest civilian honor -  Presidential Medal of Freedom.
